title: bend.out
description: The `bend.out` object formats and sends MIDI pitch bend messages. It takes normalized float values (from -1 to 1) by default, or raw 0-16383 values with the `-raw` flag, and outputs them to Pd's MIDI output and its outlet. It can also be configured to output only to its outlet using the `-ext` flag or `ext` message, allowing for flexible routing of pitch bend data.
